title: Neuroanatomy
description: Neuroanatomy with functional correlates, concentrating on mammals but also including other chordates and other phyla. Includes laboratory sessions with whole brains, gross sections, and histology. Labs are often simultaneous with lectures to permit interactive identification and contextualization of anatomical structures. Prerequisites: for neurosciences graduate students in major codes NE75 and NE78. Other disciplines may enroll with consent of instructor of record. (W)
